summary: A multimillionaire businessman seems to have it all: money, style and love ... until his rivals look to his past to destroy him.
cast: Sharman Joshi|Karan Singh Grover|Zareen Khan|Daisy Shah|Priyanshu Chatterjee|Prithvi Zutshi|Sanjay Gandhi|Puja Gupta|Dhiren Ahuja|Swaylee Loughnane|Bhavya Shinde
title: Hate Story 3
